text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea longiflora is a species of tropical lowland rainforest tree in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea longiflora". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33423A9783049. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33423A9783049.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
